fields.name: rssi_factor
fields.doc: contribution of the RSSI measured by the Friend node

fields.name: min_queue_size_log
fields.doc: minimum Queue Size of messages on the Friend node

fields.name: receive_delay
fields.doc: receive delay requested by the Low Power node

fields.name: poll_timeout
fields.doc: initial value of the Poll Timeout

fields.name: previous_address
fields.doc: unicast address of the previous Friend node

fields.name: num_elements
fields.doc: number of elements in the Low Power node

fields.name: lpn_counter
fields.doc: number of Friend Request messages sent
